name: Penguin Run!
description:
In Penguin Run, you control a penguin who has to go deeper and deeper into a cave in search of food...

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48! 

-Use arrows to move, and space to jump.

-Hover over signs to read them

-Dodge anything that looks painful.

-May take 2-3 mins to load in the worst case.

-Press r to restart.
